local_intent: Verify grape visibility; if not visible, scan in a spiral and then confirm detection.
assumptions: Grapes may be temporarily out of view; scanning can localize them within limited attempts.
coherence_with_global: Implements the global tree's initial perception: Fallback(IsObjectVisible(grape), ScanForTarget(grape, spiral, 3, 1500)) followed by DetectObject(grape, 800).
